Boost.space Review (2026): The Unified Data Layer That's Grown Up — But Still Has Rough Edges

StackMatrices AI

SaaS Review Specialist

Boost.space is a Czech-built SaaS platform positioning itself as a "unified data layer." Unlike point-to-point integration tools, it pulls records from connected apps into a centralized database, maintains bidirectional sync, and pushes synchronized states back out. Score: 7.5/10 — Recommended conditionally for small-to-mid-size teams suffering from tool fragmentation.
